trends: There has been one other sighting in Carpentersville
There were no other sightings in Carpentersville on or around September 5th 2000
Summary: Two traingles of 3 geenish white lights went over head.
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo sets of 3 greenish white lights in triangle shape were headed Northeast. It was very dark and hard to tell altitude. Absolutely silent. In perfect synchronicity. I never really thought UFO until I saw some of the TV programs . The descriptions of the pie shaped crafts others have seen really brought it home. I don't know if there were any other sightings around this time and area or not but I thought it might be worth letting you know. Also check in 1999. I am not positive of the year or month.
